title: S15 Ep4: Supernatural News/Parashare: Tim's A.I. Nightmare Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Tim's A.I. Nightmare Edition
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is here with Tim's A.I. Nightmare Edition! Supernatural News & ParaShare Saturday is ready to Blow...Your...Mind!

A.I. is on the rise this week from killer drone sightings to dishwashing and butt wiping robots & the future of Entertainment may be in the cold, dead hands of A.I.

PLUS Strange Supernatural Encounters!

Call and leave YOUR stories at 651-300-4977

Visit our store for cool Paranormal Merch here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Support our sponsors for great deals!

Are you playing along with Beyond the Darkness on the Podcast One/ Betonline.AG Sportsnet Challenge?! Each Week Dave and Tim are picking the winners of five NFL gam,es and playing against the hosts of different Podcast One shows! If you play aloing with Dave and Tim on BetOnline.AG, and they win the week, you qualify to be one of five winners splitting a $500 weekly prize! To sign up go to https://promotions.betonline.ag/podcastone

If you’re looking for a fun way to pass the time while engaging your brain and enjoying breathtaking visuals and a gripping story, your answer is Best Fiends. Best Fiends is a casual game anyone can play ! Engage your brain with fun puzzles and collect tons of cute characters! 5-star rated mobile puzzle game, Download FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play !

Looking to cut out stressful meal planning and prepping? Tired of stressful trips to the grocery store? Looking for fresh ingredients and inventive gourmet recipes that are easy and quick to make? Hello Fresh is the solution you are looking for and right now if you Go to HelloFresh.com/10beyond and use code 10beyond during HelloFresh’s New Year’s sale, you get 10 free meals including free shipping!
